sentences.en: Australia had 15 years of double-digit inflation.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚有15年通货膨胀率维持在两位数。

sentences.en: Australia made hard work of beating them.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚队非常艰难地击败了他们。

sentences.en: Australia were ahead throughout the game.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚队在整场比赛都处于领先地位。

sentences.en: Australia won the toss and put England in to bat.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚队掷币获胜，要求英格兰队首先击球。

sentences.en: Australia, put in to bat, made a cautious start.
sentences.cn: 轮到澳大利亚队出场击球，他们开始打得很谨慎。

sentences.en: Australia's rugby union side enjoyed a record-breaking win over France.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚的英式橄榄球联盟队创纪录地赢了法国队。

sentences.en: Do you think they have a chance of beating Australia?
sentences.cn: 你认为他们有可能击败澳大利亚吗？

sentences.en: Environmentalists say Australia is already overpopulated.
sentences.cn: 环保人士认为澳大利亚已经人口过剩。

sentences.en: Have you been in Australia all this while?
sentences.cn: 这段时间你一直在澳大利亚吗？

sentences.en: He decided to do something about reforesting man-made wastes of western Australia.
sentences.cn: 他决定为在澳大利亚西部人为导致荒芜的土地上重新造林做点事情。

sentences.en: He transplanted his family to Australia.
sentences.cn: 他把家迁到澳大利亚。

sentences.en: He went out to Australia about five years ago.
sentences.cn: 他大约在五年前移居澳大利亚。

sentences.en: Helen is a very well-known novelist in Australia.
sentences.cn: 海伦是澳大利亚非常著名的小说家。

sentences.en: I live in Australia.
sentences.cn: 我住在澳大利亚。

sentences.en: I'm going to be surfing bigger waves when I get to Australia!
sentences.cn: 到了澳大利亚后我要去浪头更大的地方冲浪！

sentences.en: In Rugby League, Australia trounced France by sixty points to four.
sentences.cn: 在联盟橄榄球赛上，澳大利亚队以60：4的比分大胜法国队。

sentences.en: In the past, English criminals were transported to Australia.
sentences.cn: 过去，英国犯人被流放到澳大利亚。

sentences.en: Papua New Guinea became independent from Australia in 1975.
sentences.cn: 巴布亚新几内亚1975年脱离澳大利亚正式独立。

sentences.en: The dispute could destroy Australia's hard-won reputation for industrial stability.
sentences.cn: 这场纠纷可能会让澳大利亚劳资关系稳定这一来之不易的名声毁于一旦。

sentences.en: We won three games against Australia.
sentences.cn: 我们赢了3场对澳大利亚的比赛。

sentences.en: What we are planning is cutting-edge technology never seen in Australia before.
sentences.cn: 我们正在开发的是一种在澳大利亚从未有过的尖端技术。

phrases.tran_cn: 澳大利亚日；澳洲国庆日
澳大利亚储备银行（澳大利亚中央银行）
西澳大利亚州；西澳洲（澳大利亚联邦的一个洲，位于澳大利亚西部）

trans.tran_cn: [地名][大洋洲]澳大利亚，澳洲，澳元
trans.tran_en: An island country and continent in the southern hemisphere, in the south-western Pacific Ocean, a member state of the Commonwealth of Nations; population 28,500,000 (estimated 2015); capital, Canberra; official language, English.
